body:
So recently I've been having this issue with teamspeak, I can't see until I actually join the channel, I've been googling around and found nothing that helps me. Do you know how to fix this issue?

Example:
body_tagged:
So recently I've been having this issue with teamspeak, I can't see until I actually join the channel, I've been googling around and found nothing that helps me. Do you know how to fix this issue?

Example:
title: Teamspeak issue!

replies.body: Have you connected to the same server twice with the same account?
replies.body_tagged: Have you connected to the same server twice with the same account?

replies.body: I use to have this issue but i cant remember how i fixed it.
replies.body_tagged: I use to have this issue but i cant remember how i fixed it.

replies.body:
At the top menu bar, there should be a button that says something like "subscribe all" toggle that button and it should fix your button. 

The button looks like a speech bubble with a check mark in it.
replies.body_tagged:
At the top menu bar, there should be a button that says something like "subscribe all" toggle that button and it should fix your button. 

The button looks like a speech bubble with a check mark in it.

replies.body: My fault, I'll fix that when I get on my PC. Apologies.
replies.body_tagged: My fault, I'll fix that when I get on my PC. Apologies.

replies.body: Could be the perms for your Jr Map Dev rank?
replies.body_tagged: Could be the perms for your Jr Map Dev rank?
